articles.name: Flexbox Guide
articles.description: This beginner-friendly guide to flexbox is a must for new developers! It's easy to read, easy to understand and I use it everyday when coding. When it's you against your memory this guide is a must for you. Thank me later!

articles.name: How to create a reusable React button component
articles.description: This guide explains how to create reusable React components, with a focus on buttons. It covers component creation, styling, and interactivity, helping new developers understand key React concepts and component-based development principles.

articles.name: How to merge branches to GitHub
articles.description: If you've struggled or are currently struggling with merging branches on Github, this guide is here to help. I used to waste hours trying to figure it out until I found this guide. Just like with the flexbox guide, you'll thank me later!

articles.name: How is == Different from === in JavaScript?
articles.description: This article clears up the differences between the '==' and '===' operators in JavaScript, demonstrating how they handle type coercion through examples. It strongly recommends using the strict equality operator '===' for more predictable outcomes, making it a must-read for JavaScript learners seeking coding clarity.
